hero.title: Join Our Community
hero.subtitle: Join our community of pioneers and co-creators of RyzeSpace. Discuss, share ideas, and have a real impact on the future of the platform.

discord.title: Join on Discord
discord.description: Discuss, ask questions, and get to know other community members.

sdk.title: Discover our SDK
sdk.description: Our Software Development Kit is planned for the future. Follow our progress to stay up to date!

github.title: Contribute on GitHub
github.description: Browse the code, report bugs, and help us develop the project.

footer.description: A decentralized open-source platform for secure sharing of computing resources.

authWall.title: Access the Marketplace
authWall.description: To explore our full range of server configurations and pricing, please sign in to your RyzeSpace account.

marketplace.title: Server Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Choose the perfect configuration for your needs. All plans are illustrative.

starter.name: Starter VM
starter.description: Perfect for small projects and development.

dev_pro.name: Developer Pro
dev_pro.description: Ideal for growing applications and staging.

beast.name: Compute Beast
beast.description: For demanding workloads and high-traffic apps.
